original_title: Volbeat: Outlaw Gentlemen & Shady Ladies [Tour Edition]
overview: On hour live DVD from the Outlaw Gentlemen & Shady Ladies [Tour Edition]. Contains live performances from Rock N' Heim, Hellfest, Download Festival, Roskilde Festival amd Rock Am ring - summer 2013
title: Volbeat: Outlaw Gentlemen & Shady Ladies [Tour Edition]
